CSES Helper is a powerful open source browser extension designed to elevate your experience on the CSES Online Judge platform. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced competitive programmer, this extension provides a variety of tools to help you solve problems more efficiently.

âœ… Problem Tips âœ…

âœ… Sort Problems by Number of Solvers âœ…
Quickly find the most and least solved problems to challenge yourself accordingly.

âœ… Submit Code by Text âœ… 
Conveniently submit your solutions by pasting your code directly into the extension.

Looking to contribute to the community? Join us in improving CSES Helper by opening pull requests in our GitHub repository. You can help enhance the extension by adding descriptive tags to problems, sharing your strategies and insights through problem tips, or assisting in fixing bugs to ensure a smooth user experience for all.
